title: Skill Judge
detail1: Our platform offers a vast library of challenges, each challenge is designed to be challenging yet achievable, allowing programmers to push themselves and learn new concepts along the way.
details2: It has a quiz section that provides a fun and interactive way for programmers to test their knowledge and understanding of different coding concepts.
details3: Our community forum provides a platform for programmers to learn from one another and grow together.
details4: Implement payment method and also authorize API from the backend.
technologies: TypeScript, React.js, Express.js, REST API, JWT, Rest API, Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI, Axios,React Hook form, Stripe, Firebase Auth, Motion JS etc.

title: Laptop Resale Market
detail1: Users can create different roles by registration /Social login.
details2: Different Dashboards for other role users.
details3: Add/delete/upload images/ Post Products/ Order Products and upload them to the database.
details4: Implement payment method and also authorize API from the backend.
technologies: Javascript, React.js, Express.js, REST API, JWT, Rest API, Tailwind CSS, Daisy UI, Axios,React Hook form, Stripe, Firebase Auth, etc.

title: Doctors Services
detail1: A single-page full-stack application for doctors' service providers.
details2: Users can post, delete and update their reviews.
details3: Firebase authentication is used for user authentication and user authorization.
technologies: Javascript, React.js, Express.js, MongoDB, REST API, Tailwind CSS, Firebase Auth.
